A change is created. Why does a tragedy have to happen for a change. We
created and I got a letter back and the letters said thank you for bringing this to our
attention. We didn't have lights pedestrian cross lights in that location
because Grand Central Station. Somehow the signals
interfered and they couldn't have the traffic lights
and I thought that's just sounds weird doesn't make sense but then the letter also
said that they were going to bring up my issue at the next city
council.
